alert.note: Alert for Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 7:31AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Sebastian, southeastern Pushmataha, northeastern Choctaw and southern Le Flore Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 731 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles north of Greenwood to 7 miles southeast of Cloudy. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Poteau... Heavener... Mansfield... Howe... Hartford... Huntington... Rattan... Octavia... Big Cedar... Whitesboro... Muse... Oleta... Cloudy... Patterson... Corinne... Sobol... Heavener Runestone Park... Hodgen... Honobia... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for west central Arkansas...and southeastern Oklahoma.
